data.message: Don't use the devils eye any more. it does not work for the purpose of getting Dr. Wesley who Is the one all the shot caller, call the shots, another shot and more titles are about. If you are trying to get hold of me then send me some money on my green dot card. Don't call my cell number because as you know it is not with me any more. I need some cash. I can make some beats with the help of some one who can make it first. I can make it fly like my zipper. If you still want to meat on and popping and have some oust beats and fly flows then hook it up. I really would like to show you in person what you heard spiritually or thru telekeneesis. Deuce home E.
